name: Oriium
description:
Working with IT channel providers across the UK & EMEA, our highly skilled and award winning team provide the following expert solutions-CORE INFRASTRUCTURE – CLOUD SOLUTIONS – DATA MANAGEMENT. Along with the above offerings, we also deliver Support, Consultancy, Design, Integration and Training. As a result, our wide ranging technical expertise makes us ideally positioned to be the strategic IT partner of choice.
With a "channel only"​ business model separating us from our competition.
